title: Our Products
caption: We offer two different products to cater to your needs. Choose the one that suits you best.

products.name: Tracking Detector
products.description: Tracking Detector is a Chrome web extension that blocks web tracker with the use of a pre-trained tensorflow.js model.
points: More transparency when browsing the web

products.name: Train On Surf
products.description: Train On Surf is Chrome web extension that trains a tensorflow.js model while you surf the internet.
points: Optimized for your most visited websites
